mapper.sql: id, continue_id, continueReward_one, continueReward_two, continueReward_three, continueReward_four, continueReward_five, continueReward_six, continueReward_seven, firstTime, lastTime
mapper.update:
update user_continuereward set continueReward_one=1 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_continuereward set continueReward_two=5 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_continuereward set continueReward_three=30 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_continuereward set continueReward_four=90 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_continuereward set continueReward_five=180 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_continuereward set continueReward_six=360 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_continuereward set continueReward_seven=720 where 1=1
and continue_id=#{continueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
